data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Gil-Santana, Hélcio R., Baena, Manuel, Grillo, Horacio (2013): Berengeria Gil-Santana & Coletto-Silva, a junior synonym of Ectrichodiella Fracker & Bruner, with new records and taxonomic notes on Ectrichodiinae from Brazil, and with keys to Ectrichodiinae and Reduviinae genera of the New World (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae). Zootaxa 3652 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3652.1.2
